mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (author_no, subject_code, question_content, question_a1, question_a2, question_a3, question_a4, question_a5, question_answer, question_explanation, question_pic, reg_date) VALUES (#{author_no}, #{subject_code}, #{question_content},#{question_a1}, #{question_a2}, #{question_a3}, #{question_a4}, #{question_a5}, #{question_answer}, #{question_explanation}, #{question_pic}, #{reg_date})
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET question_content = #{question_content}, question_a1 = #{question_a1}, question_a2 = #{question_a2} , question_a3 = #{question_a3}, question_a4 = #{question_a4} , question_a5 = #{question_a5}, question_answer = #{question_answer}, question_explanation = #{question_explanation}, question_pic = #{question_pic} WHERE question_no = #{question_no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.question_no question_no, a.subject_code subject_code, question_content, question_a1, question_a2, question_a3, question_a4, question_a5, question_answer, question_explanation, question_pic, reg_date, subject_name FROM question a LEFT JOIN (SELECT question_no FROM done_question WHERE user_no = #{user_no}) b ON a.question_no = b.question_no JOIN subject c ON a.subject_code = c.subject_code WHERE b.question_no IS NULL AND a.subject_code = #{subject_code} LIMIT 1;

SELECT * FROM question a JOIN (SELECT question_no, correct, user_select FROM done_question WHERE user_no = #{user_no}) b ON a.question_no = b.question_no WHERE b.correct = 'x' AND a.subject_code = #{subject_code}

SELECT * FROM question a JOIN (SELECT question_no, correct, user_select FROM done_question WHERE user_no = #{user_no}) b ON a.question_no = b.question_no WHERE b.correct = 'o' AND a.subject_code = #{subject_code}
SELECT DISTINCT subject_name FROM question a JOIN subject b ON a.subject_code = b.subject_code WHERE a.subject_code = #{subject_code}
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM question a JOIN user b ON a.author_no = b.user_no WHERE b.user_no = #{user_no}
